Hinata runs at the enemy at full speed before jumping and hitting one of the foe's vital organs. Alternatively, she may jump from a high distance and palm the foe continually until all chakra points blast.

[[es:Ocho Trigramas Ataque Aéreo]]
[[pl:Atak z powietrza Ośmiu Trygramów]]
